# sectionIndexMinimumDisplayRowCount

**Instance Property**

The number of table rows at which to display the index list on the right edge of the table.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var sectionIndexMinimumDisplayRowCount: Int { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property is applicable only to table views in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITableView/Style-swift.enum/plain] style. The default value is zero.

## Configuring the table index

- **sectionIndexColor**: The color to use for the table view’s index text.
- **sectionIndexBackgroundColor**: The color to use for the background of the table view’s section index.
- **sectionIndexTrackingBackgroundColor**: The color to use for the table view’s index background area.
- **indexSearch**: A constant for adding the magnifying glass icon to the section index of a table view.
